column2: "I like keeping guard, but I wish I could get out there and fight some enemies more often..."
"Then I've got a job just for you. Interested?"
"I'd like to do this myself, but us guards don't get many opportunities to leave our post..."

"So I'd like you to take care of some enemies in my place.
Where? ...How about Vanford Laboratory Ruins?"
"There's plenty of strong enemies there, so it's a great place for getting some combat experience."
"When you get there, just cut loose and see how many you can take down."
"You've racked up a bunch of enemy kills... So, you feel any stronger?"
"I dunno, there's just something about watching you fight. I just wish I could be out there too..."
"Right... Well, come see me if you ever change your mind."
